item.description:
We had a great time seeing the classic Monty Python film recently, and this is another great and important film. To blatantly cut and paste from Wikipedia http://en.wikipedia.o..., as I love to do: "In 2001, Planet of the Apes was selected for preservation in the United States National Film Registry by the Library of Congress as being "culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant"."

We will meet at Main Street Caffe before the movie.** They have great food and coffee! It is on Rt.68/70 near the library and Rt. 10. If you have never been there- feel free to email me for more info. Come join us! **if George shows up, you can go out for drinks after the movie if you prefer! But the Main Street Caffe closes at 9 p.m.

If you can not come to the Caffe, that is fine.. just MEET US AT THE MOVIE at 7 p.m. Park in back of the library. When you enter the building the movie is in the first room to your left.
Cheshire Public Library
104 Main Street
Cheshire , CT 06410
203-272-2245
Cheshire public library website: http://www.cheshireli...

Imdb link: http://www.imdb.com/t...
item.name: Go Bananas: Planet of the Apes (original) and Main Street Caffe in Cheshire.
